featuresList.text: Files are hashed and compared against AniDB's database to find the correct episode and series.
Easily handle multiple, duplicate and missing files within your collection using our built-in utilities.
Shoko integrates with Plex, Kodi & MediaPortal allowing you to watch your collection wherever you'd like.
Expand the capabilities of Shoko to suite your needs or to bring Shoko to an entirely new platform.
